dt-api.summary: Get the DOM element for the selected cell

type.description: Get the DOM element for the selected cell
type.returns: The `dt-tag TD` / `dt-tag TH` cell the selector resolved to

dt-api.description: This method, used in-combination with the `dt-api cell()` method (and therefore the various selector forms that it allows) will obtain the DOM node for the selected cell, allowing it to be directly manipulated.
